document_data.name: Erich Inshiland
document_data.mainbody: '''Erich Inshiland''' was the [[Grand Mairshar]] of [[Tasseldale]] in early 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He followed the reign of [[Elizzaria Whitehand]], having been groomed by her at an early age as she prepared to step down.
document_data.History: In [[1420 DR]], Grand Mairshar Inshiland led the dale in battle to resist the invasion of [[Sembia]]n mercenaries from [[Yhaunn]]. Their forces lost unfortunately, and the dale fell under the rule of Sembia.
document_data.Personality: During his youth, Erich was known for having a cheerful disposition,  which grew into a charismatic personality as leader of Tasseldale.
